list_definition.definition: the period from sunrise to sunset

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The days are warm, but the nights are cold.

list_definition.definition: a part of this period eg that part spent at work

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: How long is your working day?

list_definition.definition: the period of twenty-four hours from one midnight to the next

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: How many days does September have?

list_definition.definition: the period of, or of the greatest activity, influence, strength etc of (something or someone)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There was far less traffic on the roads in my grandfather’s day
